htn_kidney.title: Circadian rhythm modulation and immune landscape heterogeneity in hypertensive nephropathy: A comprehensive molecular exploration.
htn_kidney.authors: Jiao Y, Liu L, Lin W
htn_kidney.zhSummary: 该文聚焦高血压肾病，属于临床研究。核心观点：提出了预测模型，有助于临床分层与治疗选择。
htn_kidney.abstract: The objective of this study was to unveil the interplay between circadian rhythms (CR) and hypertensive nephropathy (HTN) by investigating genes, pathways, and molecular functions and the correlation between CR and HTN's immune landscape through bioinformatic approaches. Key genes associated with CR in HTN were screened through an integrated analysis of GEO data, employing consensus clustering and machine learning approaches (Generalized Linear Models (GLM), Random Forest (RF), and Support Vector Machine (SVM)). CIBERSORT, ESTIMATE and ssGSEA algorithm were used to assess the infiltration of immune cells between HTN and control groups and in three distinct CR phenotypes of HTN. Functional an...

htn_kidney.title: Integrated genomics and metabolomics to identify cause-specific biomarkers for chronic kidney disease in a Korean population.
htn_kidney.authors: Kang MW, Kim JE, Kang J
htn_kidney.zhSummary: 该文聚焦高血压肾病，属于临床研究。核心观点：提出了预测模型，有助于临床分层与治疗选择。
htn_kidney.abstract: The heterogeneity of chronic kidney disease (CKD) and fragmented analysis methods hinder the precise identification of novel biomarkers. We addressed this challenge using two independent cohorts to integrate genomics and metabolomics, aiming to identify cause-specific biomarkers for CKD in the Korean population. A longitudinal genome-wide association study using the Cox proportional hazards model was conducted using the Ansan and Ansung cohort. To validate these genomic biomarkers and integrate them with plasma metabolomics biomarkers, we utilized a hospital-based biopsy cohort to identify cause-specific CKD biomarkers. htn_kidney.title: Targeting the PHD2/HIF-1α/HO-1 pathway: A key role of trimetazidine in hypertensive nephropathy.
htn_kidney.journal: Clinical and experimental hypertension (New York, N.Y. : 1993)
htn_kidney.authors: Gu D, Chen M, Yang Y
htn_kidney.zhSummary: 该文聚焦高血压肾病，属于临床研究（样本量约为 129）。核心观点：提出了预测模型，有助于临床分层与治疗选择。
htn_kidney.abstract: This study seeks to unravel the effects of trimetazidine (TMZ) on hypertensive nephropathy (HN) in mice and its underlying mechanisms. Sixty male 129 mice (8-10 weeks old) were randomly categorized into six groups ( n = 10 per group): control, model, TMZ, TMZ + small interfering RNA targeting prolyl hydroxylase domain protein 2 (si-PHD2), TMZ + zinc protoporphyrin [ZnPP, a heme oxygenase-1 (HO-1) inhibitor], and TMZ + KC7F2 [a hypoxia-inducible factor-1 alpha (HIF-1α) inhibitor]. All groups except the control group received angiotensin II to induce HN models. htn_kidney.title: Targeting αvβ8 Integrin with Monoclonal Antibody MEDI8367 Prevents Fibrosis in Preclinical Models of CKD.
htn_kidney.authors: Marin EL, Seth A, Liang L
htn_kidney.zhSummary: 该文聚焦高血压肾病，属于临床研究。核心观点：提出了预测模型，有助于临床分层与治疗选择。
htn_kidney.abstract: CKD is a global health issue exacerbated by the rising prevalence of diabetes and obesity. Renal fibrosis, characterized by the accumulation of extracellular matrix proteins, is a critical factor in CKD progression. Transforming growth factor β (TGF-β), a key profibrotic cytokine, plays a pivotal role in this process. However, systemic inhibition of TGF-β has been limited by associated toxicities. This study explores the role of αvβ8 integrin in renal fibrosis and its potential as a therapeutic target in CKD. We used various preclinical models of CKD, including humanized αvβ8 mice and the db/db uninephrectomy model, to investigate the role of αvβ8 integrin in renal fibrosis. Gene Set Variati...

htn_kidney.title: Immunofluorescence staining profiles of glomerular diseases: a single-center retrospective study.
htn_kidney.authors: Song J, Cui X, Yuan S
htn_kidney.zhSummary: 该文聚焦高血压肾病，属于临床研究（样本量约为 10）。核心观点：提供了可直接用于临床判断的新证据。
htn_kidney.abstract: Immunofluorescence (IF) staining is essential for diagnosing glomerular diseases, yet comprehensive characterization of immune deposition patterns remains limited. We retrospectively analyzed 10,489 consecutive native kidney biopsies (2011-2022) from a tertiary center. IF staining for IgA, IgG, IgM, C1q, C3, C4d, and fibronectin was semi-quantitatively graded (0-4+) and deposits classified as mesangial area only (MAO), glomerular capillary loop only (GCLO), or combined mesangial-capillary loop (MA-GCL). IgA nephropathy (IgAN) was the most frequent diagnosis (38.4 %), followed by membranous nephropathy (16.8 %) and focal segmental glomerulosclerosis (13.7 %). IgA deposition was universal in I...

portal_hypertension.title: UDV-Net: A hybrid CNN and transformer vein segmentation network with vascular prior and spatial awareness.
portal_hypertension.authors: Shen B, Huang X, Li Y
portal_hypertension.zhSummary: 该文聚焦门静脉高压症，属于临床研究。核心观点：提出了预测模型，有助于临床分层与治疗选择。
portal_hypertension.abstract: CNNs handling multi-scale variations and Transformers modeling long-range dependencies are crucial for vascular segmentation. The fusion of these two models effectively combines the multi-scale local features extracted by CNNs with the global information modeled by Transformers, significantly enhancing the accuracy of blood vessel segmentation. However, the powerful model faces challenges when dealing with the gradual formation of extensive collateral vessels in the upper digestive system veins of patients with cirrhotic portal hypertension, leading to numerous false negative and false positive segmentation results. portal_hypertension.title: Percutaneous transabdominal plug-assisted antegrade and retrograde transvenous embolization for the treatment of ruptured paraumbilical varices with concurrent flood syndrome: A case report.
portal_hypertension.authors: Rogers S, Phan Q, Krishnarao A
portal_hypertension.zhSummary: 该文聚焦门静脉高压症，属于临床研究（样本量约为 30）。核心观点：强调出血控制与再出血预防仍是管理重点。
portal_hypertension.abstract: Ruptured paraumbilical varices and Flood syndrome (umbilical hernia rupture with ascites leakage) are both life-threatening conditions, each carrying >30% mortality. Co-occurrence of the 2 requires immediate portal decompression and variceal hemostasis for a chance of survival. This report presents a case of concurrent paraumbilical variceal rupture and Flood syndrome with massive leakage of ascites and blood in a 52-year-old male with alcohol-related cirrhosis. A strategy combining transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt (TIPS) with direct percutaneous transvenous paraumbilical variceal embolization enabled immediate cessation of bleeding and eventual survival. Direct percutaneous tra...

portal_hypertension.title: Non-contrast CT esophageal varices grading through clinical prior-enhanced multi-organ analysis.
portal_hypertension.authors: Zhang X, Li C, Hao J
portal_hypertension.zhSummary: 该文聚焦门静脉高压症，属于临床研究（样本量约为 60）。核心观点：强调出血控制与再出血预防仍是管理重点。
portal_hypertension.abstract: Esophageal varices (EV) represent a critical complication of portal hypertension, affecting approximately 60% of cirrhosis patients with a significant bleeding risk of ∼ 30%. While traditionally diagnosed through invasive endoscopy, non-contrast computed tomography (NCCT) presents a potential non-invasive alternative that has yet to be fully utilized in clinical practice. We present Multi-Organ-COhesion Network++ (MOON++), a novel multimodal framework that enhances EV assessment through comprehensive analysis of NCCT scans. portal_hypertension.title: Pathophysiology of cystic fibrosis-related liver disease.
portal_hypertension.authors: Palmiotti A, Bertolini A, Fiorotto R
portal_hypertension.zhSummary: 该文聚焦门静脉高压症，属于综述研究（样本量约为 10）。核心观点：总结了当前治疗路径及证据分层，强调个体化决策。
portal_hypertension.abstract: Cystic fibrosis liver disease (CFLD) is a significant nonpulmonary complication of cystic fibrosis, affecting approximately 5-10% of patients. It encompasses a spectrum of hepatic abnormalities ranging from mild, transient elevations in liver enzymes to advanced CFLD (aCFLD), which is marked by clinically relevant portal hypertension due to cirrhotic or noncirrhotic liver pathology. This review focuses on aCFLD as the clinically meaningful form of the disease and summarizes recent mechanistic insights into its pathogenesis that may inform the development of targeted therapeutic strategies. CFLD pathogenesis has been traditionally linked to defective bile secretion. Emerging evidence, however...
